summary: Comprehensive testing of F1 Fast Lap Challenge after App.js restoration from git commit 9e00867. All 10 requested features tested and verified working correctly.

passed_tests.details: Login page shows default credentials hint, login successful with admin/admin
All 7 buttons visible: Design, Event, Strecken, E-Mail, Teilnehmer(0), Passwort, CSV
Dialog opens with 5 tabs: Titel, Farben, Schriften, Hintergrund, Website. All tabs clickable and functional
Dialog shows 'Event Einstellungen' with Status dropdown (Abgeschlossen visible), Strecke auswählen dropdown
Dialog shows 'Strecken verwalten' with Streckenname, Land, Streckenbild (URL + upload button), existing track 'Silverstone' listed
Dialog shows tabs (SMTP, Template, Senden), SMTP fields: Host, Port, Benutzername, Passwort, Absender E-Mail, Absender Name, Test button
Form with Fahrername, Team (optional), Zeit fields. Added 'Test Fahrer T1' successfully with toast 'Hinzugefügt!'
Edit (pencil) and Delete (trash) buttons visible for each entry. Edit dialog opens on click. Delete confirmed via API test
Shows all 5 entries with rank badges (gold/silver/bronze for top 3), driver names, teams, lap times, gaps
Exports CSV with headers: Platz, Fahrer, Team, Rundenzeit, Abstand. All entries included correctly

seed_data_creation: Created test entry 'Test Fahrer T1' during testing, cleaned up after verification
context_for_next_testing_agent: All original Admin Panel features restored and working: Design Editor (5 tabs), Event Settings, Strecken-Verwaltung with image upload, E-Mail Settings with SMTP, Teilnehmer management, Passwort ändern, CSV Export, Rundenzeit CRUD. 4 existing lap entries in database (Max Verstappen, Lewis Hamilton, Charles Leclerc, Test Driver). One track 'Silverstone' exists.

features_verified.event_dialog: Status dropdown with Geplant option visible, Strecke auswählen dropdown
features_verified.strecken_dialog: Streckenname, Land, Streckenbild with upload, existing tracks list
features_verified.email_dialog: SMTP settings with Host, Port, credentials, Test button
features_verified.teilnehmer_dialog: Name, E-Mail fields with Hinzufügen button
features_verified.passwort_dialog: Current password, New password, Confirm fields with Ändern button
features_verified.rundenzeit_form: Fahrername, Team, Zeit fields with Hinzufügen button
features_verified.public_leaderboard: Shows all entries with ranks, times, gaps
